source_sentence: 若有菩薩，發趣大乘、讀誦大乘、攝受大乘，常於此人恭敬歸向，承事親近狎習談論，所有衣食共為受用，與彼菩薩而共同住同經行處，常求大乘、攝取大乘、受持大乘，以種種香華塗香末香燈明華鬘，敬心供養，常惟讀誦大乘經典，以歡喜心演說大乘。
translation: If there's a bodhisattva who aspires to the great vehicle, recites the great vehicle, and takes in the great vehicle, he always venerates and returns to that person, serves and approaches them, intimately engages in discussions, shares his food and clothing, lives in the same sūtra practice site with that bodhisattva, always seeks the great vehicle, takes in the great vehicle, and maintains it, respectfully makes offerings with various kinds of flowers, coats them with incense, finishes them with incense, lights them up, and decorates them with flowers, always recites the sutras of the great vehicle, and expounds the great vehicle with a joyous heart.

source_sentence: 於未學菩薩不起慢心，於餘菩薩亦令安住，含笑先言，語不麁獷，所說柔軟令人樂聞，於他亦爾。
translation: He doesn't become arrogant toward untrained bodhisattvas and makes other bodhisattvas stand still, speaking first with a smile, not harsh in speech, and speaking softly enough to be pleasant to hear, even for others.

translation: Even if he were to encounter the cause of losing his life, he wouldn't abandon the mind of the great vehicle.

translation: If there are bodhisattvas who arouse interest in the great vehicle, recite it, and embrace it, they rejoice and adhere to it with a superior mind, teach others to respect and make offerings, and don't engage in disputes with others.

translation: All the śrāvakas and solitary realizers of the three times who cultivate generosity, morality, tolerance, diligence, meditation, and wisdom over countless eons do so to end their own afflictions; it's not the case with bodhisattvas, even when they give a tiny bit to an unenlightened person, because the Three Treasures are not cut off.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人以瞋惡心毀壞無量無邊無數獨覺戒、定、智慧、解脫解脫知見；假使有人以瞋惡心於一信樂大乘菩薩損壞戒支及所學事令不成就，其罪重彼無量無數。
translation: If someone with ill-will destroys the measureless, limitless, and countless pratyekabuddha precepts, concentration, wisdom, and knowledge of liberation and liberation, or if someone with ill-will destroys the precepts and the things they've trained at the hands of a faithful great vehicle bodhisattva so that they aren't accomplished, their crimes are incalculable and numerous.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 一切三世聲聞獨覺，於無數劫，所有戒、定、智慧、解脫、解脫知見，皆為自身斷除煩惱；菩薩不爾，乃至一日修戒、定、慧、解脫、解脫知見，皆為有情斷除煩惱。
translation: All the śrāvakas and solitary realizers of the three times who have exercised precepts, meditation, wisdom, liberation, and the knowledge and vision of liberation for countless eons have ended their own afflictions; bodhisattvas don't, even if they cultivate precepts, meditation, wisdom, liberation, and the knowledge and vision of liberation one day, they all end the afflictions for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人以瞋惡心繫縛十方一切有情置牢獄中；若復有人以瞋惡心於菩薩所不欲眼視背之而去，其罪重彼無量無數。
translation: If someone with an ill-willful mind binds all sentient beings in the ten directions and puts them in prison, and if someone with an ill-willful mind turns their back on a bodhisattva because they don't want to look at him, their crimes would be incalculable and numerous.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人以瞋惡心挑出十方一切世界有情眼目；若復有人以瞋惡心於菩薩所不欲眼視背之而去，其罪重彼無量無數。
translation: If someone with an ill-will provokes the eyes of sentient beings in the whole world in the ten directions, and if someone with an ill-will provokes the eyes of a bodhisattva who doesn't want to look at them and turns away, their offense would be incalculable and numerous.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使十方一切有情皆被挑目；復有餘人於彼有情起大慈心令眼平復所得功德，若復有人以清淨心而往瞻視大乘菩薩，其福勝彼無量無數。
translation: Suppose all sentient beings in the ten directions were to have their eyes picked, and there were some other person who arouse great kindness toward those sentient beings and makes their eyes level, then if someone else with a pure mind went to look at the great vehicle bodhisattva, their merit would be immeasurable and incalculable beyond that.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人能令十方所有獄囚皆得解脫，受轉輪聖王天帝釋樂；若復有人以清淨心瞻視讚歎大乘菩薩，其福勝彼無量無數。
translation: Suppose someone could cause all the prisoners in the ten directions to be liberated and receive the pleasure of the wheel-turning sage king god Indra, and suppose someone were to look at and praise a great vehicle bodhisattva with a pure heart, their merits would be incalculable and beyond measure.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人能令十方一切有情證獨覺果所得功德；若復有人教一信樂大乘菩薩，曾於佛所種一善根令得增長，其福勝彼無量無數。
translation: Suppose someone could cause all sentient beings in the ten directions to realize the merits gained from the fruit of pratyekabuddha, and suppose they were to teach a faithful great vehicle bodhisattva who had planted a single good root in a Buddha's place and caused it to grow, that would be an immeasurable and incalculable merit greater than theirs.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 若有深信大乘菩薩於十方世界一切有情皆令安住菩提之心所得功德；若復有人以大乘法乃至一頌教示於他，其福勝彼無量無數。
translation: "If there's a convinced great vehicle bodhisattva who causes all sentient beings in the world in the ten directions to abide in the mind of enlightenment and attain merit, and if someone teaches others the great vehicle teaching even a verse, their merit will be immeasurable and incalculable beyond theirs.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人以十方世界微塵數獨覺，置於地獄、餓鬼、傍生；若復有人於一初發菩提心者而作障礙，其罪重彼無量無數。
translation: If someone were to place a tiny particle of solitary realizers from the worlds of the ten directions in the path of hell, hungry ghosts, or unenlightened people, and if someone were to obstruct a person who has just begun to arouse the aspiration for enlightenment, their crimes would be numberless and incalculable.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人於十方世界一切有情發菩提心者而作障礙；若復有人於一深信大乘菩薩菩提之心而作障礙，其罪重彼無量無數。
translation: If someone were to obstruct the enlightened minds of all sentient beings in the world in the ten directions, and if someone were to obstruct the enlightened mind of a bodhisattva who believes deeply in the great vehicle, their crimes would be incalculable and numerous.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使十方一切有情，皆墮地獄、餓鬼、傍生、琰摩王界，設復有人救濟令出，復教安住菩提之心所得功德；若復有人令一有情於大乘中深生信解，其福勝彼無量無數。
translation: Suppose all sentient beings in the ten directions were to fall into the realms of hell, hungry ghosts, animals, and King Diem, and someone were to rescue them and allow them to escape and teach them the virtues gained from abiding in the mind of enlightenment; if someone were to cause a single sentient being to deeply believe in the great vehicle, their merits would be immeasurable and incalculable.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人於十方世界滿中獨覺而生輕慢，若復有人於一初始發心菩薩生輕慢心，其罪重彼無量無數。
translation: If someone were to become contemptuous of the solitary realizer in the entire world in the ten directions, and if someone were to become contemptuous of a bodhisattva who has just begun to arouse his aspiration, their offense would be incalculably grave.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 假使有人於十方世界微塵數獨覺斷絕利養，於十方界彰其惡名；若復有人於一深信大乘菩薩斷絕利養彰其惡名，其罪重彼無量無數。
translation: If someone were to sever the profit and benefit of a tiny number of solitary realizers in the worlds of the ten directions and give them a bad reputation in the worlds of the ten directions, and if someone were to sever the profit and benefit of a single deeply believed great vehicle bodhisattva and give them a bad reputation, their crimes would be incalculably grave.

source_sentence: 「妙吉祥！
translation: "Wonderful and auspicious!

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人，於一深信大乘菩薩，為求正法故乃至施一水瓶，由此福業當得無量轉輪聖王勝妙果報，何況施與受持讀誦深生信解菩薩摩訶薩。」
translation: If good sons and good women were to give a single flask of water to a convinced great vehicle bodhisattva in order to pursue the right teaching, this meritorious action would lead to measureless victorious and wonderful rewards for the wheel-turning sage king, not to mention giving it to a bodhisattva-mahāsattva who accepts, reads, and recites it with deep faith."

source_sentence: 爾時世尊說此經已，妙吉祥童子及諸菩薩摩訶薩、諸聲聞眾，天、龍、藥叉、健闥婆、阿蘇羅、揭路荼、人非人等，皆大歡喜，信受奉行。
translation: After the Bhagavān spoke this sūtra, the Boy Miaojixiang, the bodhisattvas, the great śrāvakas, gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, humans, and nonhumans all rejoiced greatly and faithfully accepted and approved of it.

source_sentence: 入定不定印經
translation: Sutra on the Indeterminate Seal of Concentration
